cyclone.name: GRACE
cyclone.current_location: about 20 miles SW of Grand Cayman
cyclone.trajectory: tracking west-northwest across the northwest Caribbean toward the Yucatan Peninsula and then the southwest Gulf of Mexico
cyclone.expected_landfall_location: eastern Yucatan Peninsula near Tulum, Mexico

weather_observation.watch_coast: None in effect for the Virgin Islands – current watches confined to southern Cuba and Yucatan Peninsula
weather_observation.warning_coast: None in effect for the Virgin Islands – current warnings confined to Cayman Islands and Yucatan Peninsula
weather_observation.impacted_coast: Cayman Islands, southern Cuba, Yucatan Peninsula, and eventually the southwest Gulf coast of Mexico
weather_observation.closest_wind_data_location: None (Virgin Islands not listed in wind-probability table)
weather_observation.wind: No tropical-storm-force winds expected at Virgin Islands - St. Croix, VI; system has moved well west of the area.
